Projects

    Frontier Summer Lab Research

    Internship at Hosoda Laboratory in Osaka Univerity, Japan.
    Contributed into the development of the CRANE-X7 by RT CORPORATION.

    Demo #1 Demo #2 GitHub
    Wind Map

    A map of real-time wind patterns over California.
    Developed with Google Maps JavaScript API and OpenWeatherMap API

    *OpenWeatherMap has implemented a "limit of 25 square degrees for Free and Startup plans" since development so no support for now. But in the meantime, check out the screenshots on GitHub.

    Live GitHub
    California Housing

    A California map using 1990s housing data to compare statistics of counties. User can obtain heatmaps and color-coded stats with interactive data selection.

    *Refresh the web page if California county layout is not shown

    Live GitHub
    Gravity Simulator

    A JavaScript Gravity Simulator.
    Developed with JavaScript and p5.js library.

    Live GitHub
    ML Sentiment Analysis

    A Machine Learning Movie Review Classifier. Evaluate and classify the sentiment of movie reviews using over 100,000 textual phrases. Techniques implemented include Bag of Words and SVM.
    Developed with Python and SciKit-Learn.

    GitHub

About Me

Hello, my name is Andrew.

I like to code and take photos.
But when I'm not working, I love to paint, hike, skateboard, and watch nature documentaries.

You can find my resume here.
Here is my online workspace where you can find a collection of photos, code, art, and everything else.
